branchCategory.name: 90/91-C(D)UK, Free Mount Cylinder, Non-rotating, Double Acting
branchCategory.description: <p>The series 90-CDUK and 91-CDUK non-rotating free mount cylinder saves space and allows direct and precise mounting. 90-CDU is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. 91-CDU includes a "Lub-retainer" and is compatible with low dew point (40°C) applications. It is available in 6mm to 32mm bore sizes with stroke lengths up to 50mm. </p>

breadCrumb.name: 90/91-C(D)UK, Free Mount Cylinder, Non-rotating, Double Acting
